name: Hyperland
description:
A multiplayer game with one Boss player and multiple tiny players.

Boss players dodge the attacks of players and attack using their throwing items, grenade launcher, hammers, etc., and tiny players perform cooperative play to attack huge Boss players.

tiny players' means of attack consist of regular bombs and explosive bombs, and chemical bombs that temporarily blind the opponent. An electronic bomb that temporarily limits an opponent's movement, a painkiller bomb that removes all restrictions and restores energy.


The basic map terrain of the game is in the form of a cube, and in the future, we plan to allow users to create and distribute custom maps and to play the game in more diverse backgrounds.
